snippet.title: ✅  Johnny Depp trial shown pics of poo that 'destroyed' his marriage to Amber Heard
snippet.description:
💖 Please Visit: https://www.facebook.com/Scathc/
💖 Please Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQju4Bo1Tjk9SzhHQDknWaw?sub_confirmation=1
✍  Pictures of the poo that 'destroyed' 's marriage to Amber Heard were shown in court today.   His housekeeper Hilda Vargas gave her testimony in the sixth day of Depp's libel trial against News Group Newspapers at London's High Court on Tuesday.   Depp is suing NGN and The Sun for a 201 article in which he was ced a "wife beater" - which he strenuously denies.  Vargas produced several pictures of the poo that was found in the former couple's bed, which Depp has said was the reason he decided to end their marriage.  Heard, 34, has said the poo must have been done by their dogs, but Depp suspects that it was left there by her or one of her friends.    In her witness statement which she answered questions on today, Vargas said that just over a month after she found the poo Heard became angry with her when she found out about the pictures.  Vargas said: "Ms Heard told me that the pictures I had taken of the faeces had destroyed her marriage.  "I was very nervous and so I apologised, even t ...
💖 #JohnnyDepp, #AmberHeard, #Marriage
